title: Riot, all these new dinosaur skins.
body:
I'm SO happy you guys are lovers of Jurassic Park.
Seriously.
I know these have to do with the "Hold on to your buffs" video, and that's amazing.
But this small part of me is BEGGING for a dinosaur champion.

For those who haven't seen them yet; http://www.surrenderat20.net/2015/05/527-pbe-update.html

replies.body: All these dinosaur skins belong in a museum?
Jeff Goldblum Ezreal confirmed?
*insert Ezreal taunt spam gif*
Im currently the 138th most played Anivia in North America, you can only imagine how excited I am about this awesome anivia skin for only 750RP

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenMistninja,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:55:42.309+0000)
>
> Im currently the 138th most played Anivia in North America, you can only imagine how excited I am about this awesome anivia skin for only 750RP

Holy crap, that's nuts! Glad you hear you're a big fan of the new skin! Blackfrost was quite the skin to follow! :P

These skins look really good! But I have one problem with them (at least the Cho'Gath skin)........... 750 RP.........
Please would you make Cho'Gath roar when w's and instead of talking (walking/attacking) he grumbles, growls, and roars?
Otherwise this skin is basically just Jurassic Cho'Gath with scales and flesh......
This is my only complaint/concern
testify

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=00000000,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:57:45.977+0000)
>
> Holy crap, that's nuts! Glad you hear you're a big fan of the new skin! Blackfrost was quite the skin to follow! :P

Hey Riot I was Curious on why you chose Cho'Gath for this skin line. As this will now give him 2 Dino themed skins. I was thinking of maybe having Kha'Zix be a dino

> [{quoted}](name=DErpMAstEr651,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=000000000002,timestamp=2015-05-28T14:20:14.624+0000)
>
> Hey Riot I was Curious on why you chose Cho'Gath for this skin line. As this will now give him 2 Dino themed skins. I was thinking of maybe having Kha'Zix be a dino

We felt that Cho'Gath fit in with the dinosaur theme, and while he does have a Jurassic skin, Prehistoric plays off the living rendition of dinosaurs. I think Kha'Zix could definitely work for a Prehistoric skin! Just because there's only x number of skins for a theme currently doesn't mean there couldn't be more in the future!

My only concern with prehistoric Cho is that it looks a lot like Rune wars Renekton. I can tell the difference, but having both in a game would be messy.

Otherwise, looks great!
I say leave the current cho gath skin because I love it, and just add a dino kha skin with the set :P
I have an amazing idea for a spooky Anivia skin around harrowing if you have a place I could maybe post a verbal description on my idea.

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenMistninja,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=000000000004,timestamp=2015-05-28T15:27:37.867+0000)
>
> I have an amazing idea for a spooky Anivia skin around harrowing if you have a place I could maybe post a verbal description on my idea.

This board (Champion and Skin Concepts) would be a great spot!

I love blackfrost, due to having different animations, But i play enough anivia I find I really like playing some of the older less common anivia skins most people disregard, such as noxus hunter anivia and team spirit, actually I own and play every one of her skins, I try to switch it up every game.

@TrueSummoner To find my ranking I use a non download website called lolskill.net. And it has two lists for every champ, It has skill list and enthusiast aka most played. Im on the most played, not the best :D

Metal weapons in the Jurassic era? Kappa.

How about making the weapon made of stones, or fishbones?

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenMistninja,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:55:42.309+0000)
>
> Im currently the 138th most played Anivia in North America, you can only imagine how excited I am about this awesome anivia skin for only 750RP

how do you know you're the 138th most played Anivia in NA?

>Im currently the 138th most played Anivia in North America

How can you tell?

With 130 more morg gamesthis season you would be on the North American Most played Morg list. Some of this comes down to certain champs are more played than others, I feel Morgana is a common pick at the moment, so you would need many more games than a champ like maybe urgot.
Ahh I see. I never knew that's how that worked.

> [{quoted}](name=FrozenMistninja,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:55:42.309+0000)
>
> Im currently the 138th most played Anivia in North America, you can only imagine how excited I am about this awesome anivia skin for only 750RP

How did you find that out?

Sorry I replyed to your comment on the wrong spot. I use a website called lolskill.net
This site has two types of lists, it has toplists for the top 1000 players in the world, and it has enthusiast lists for 1000 most played in the world. It has a handy feature which lets you filter the server. I filter to North America and since im top 1000 played anivia in the world it shows me, and in North America im 138th, world im somewhere around 250?. It changes every 24 hours so sometiems I go up 1-10 spots, sometimes i go down around 1-10. Earlier this season I got as high as 24th in North America, and top 50 World.

Heck yeah, Jurassic Park! (Jurassic World June 12!!!)

Glad to see you've decoded the Hold on to your Buffs video. ;D 

Now, the important question here is, what kind of dinosaur would said champion be? :o
is there any chance for more of these theme of skins because i would love to see a velociraptor {{champion:121}} one

> [{quoted}](name=Chespin2013,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=00010001,timestamp=2015-05-28T02:12:29.041+0000)
>
> is there any chance for more of these theme of skins because i would love to see a velociraptor {{champion:121}} one

It's certainly not out of the question! ^-^
Oh! what about Brachauchenius {{champion:421}}? (it's one of those swimming dinosaurs)
He would evolve into a chicken.  :B

Personally, Utahraptor is my favourite dinosaur.
Fun fact: Velociraptors were actually very tiny; About as big as a dog.
Utahraptor, however, were slightly bigger than the raptors shown in movies.
I think "Velociraptor" just came off as scarier, so they put them in.  :p  That's what I'd like a dino champion to be!
I could go for a monstrous T-Rex kinda thing though.

Also, let the skins team know..
Triceratops Alistar where?
Ichtyosaurus fizz and Ankylosaurammus

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:58:56.977+0000)
>
> Heck yeah, Jurassic Park! (Jurassic World June 12!!!)
> 
> Glad to see you've decoded the Hold on to your Buffs video. ;D 
> 
> Now, the important question here is, what kind of dinosaur would said champion be? :o

The champion would be an ancient poro
If we're going by the video, it'd be big and tanky :/ that's all I got. {{item:3073}} T-rex Hype Train!!!!

Passive- earthshaker: dinky the dinosaur is big, every x ( based on movement) unleash a {{item:3068}}  pulse that interrupts channels
Secondly his model wont just be a big circle but one for his head, on for his legs, and the tail. If you hit the head, bonus damage , legs,normal damage,  and if you hit the tail it blocks (%) of the damages. The other two hit boxes follow the head.

Bam!  Size and tanky passive
 what do you think?

I got an idea for the story, Dinky the t-rex used to be a skeleton in a museum. One day, a necromancer came into town for some supplies and stopped by the museum. He saw Dinky's skeleton and thought he could use it as a minion. That night, the necromancer stole the skeleton and took it home. There, he resurrected Dinky, who immediately turn around and ate the necromancer. The dark magic within the necromancer gave Dinky sentience and the desire to rule the world and resurrect all dinosaurs.

> [{quoted}](name=Riot KateyKhaos,realm=NA,application-id=A8FQeEA8,discussion-id=vqOR9xgk,comment-id=0001,timestamp=2015-05-28T00:58:56.977+0000)
>
> Heck yeah, Jurassic Park! (Jurassic World June 12!!!)
> 
> Glad to see you've decoded the Hold on to your Buffs video. ;D 
> 
> Now, the important question here is, what kind of dinosaur would said champion be? :o

Two words:

Velociraptor Cavalryman.
It would be a Stegosaurus that got got frozen in an iceberg after swallowing a piece of true ice, but after many centuries his body grown able to cultivate the magic and now he has control over ice.
ANIVIA IS A GODDAMN PTERODACTYL
It's awesome as well. And this patch will be released the same week that Jurassic World comes out.. Soooo they will probably come out on June 12th or at least I hope :)
After Ekko I'm buying {{champion:34}} her and {{champion:31}} 's skins look AMAZING

I just had a weird thought.  Intermediate vs. AI, the bots will sometimes use skins, so...

*grins evilly*

If we get all the dinosaur skins as Bots, dare I call them...Dinobots?
Congrats to the skins team on some really awesome looking 750s!
all i want to say is can someone draw alistar as triceratops

I think Riot did a great job with these Prehistoric skins! They are great quality and I'm happy they are giving people awesome quality skins at a lower price and not just releasing 1350 skins! Thanks Riot =] I really appreciate it.
Only 3 have been posted so far, I can see 2 more being added in to fit the big splash arts they have been doing ;) Rito loves doing these kinds of splash arts now.

Been a while since I've played (no computer :( ) but I love these skins! :) I'm a manager at a movie theater and they immediately made me think of Jurassic World! Can't wait to see it...even though it will be super busy! I also can't wait to play league again :'(
My only question is how do you choose between Jurassic and Prehistoric Cho'gath??? they're so similar I thought they had VU-ed the old skin at first.
Jurassic Skins are skeletal, while the Prehistoric line is living Dinos.
Gromp is finally becoming a champion!
There should totally be a taunt between Prehistoric and Jurassic {{champion:31}} !
Those skins look great!
